name: temp
description: The temperature of the particular date in Leiden (source: Weerlive API).

name: sun%
description: The sun percentage on the particular date in Leiden (source: Weerlive API).

name: rain%
description: The percentage of rain on a particular date in Leiden (source: Weerlive API).

name: windbft
description: The wind force on the particular date in Leiden (source: Weerlive API).

name: expectedForecast
description: The expected forecast is described in words.

name: summary
description: A summary of the expected forecast.

name: city
description: Metadata of which city the forecast is gathered from (default: Leiden).

name: source
description: Metadata of which source the weather forecast is gathered from (default: weerlive).
